column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////But as a team of 60+ people
column2: we do our best to keep the tables turning WITHOUT making anyone feel rushed. Occasionally customers will bring laptops and folders filled with documents to hold impromptu business meetings at our tables. We don't prohibit this
column3: but we also don't encourage it. We simply make do
column4: and hope that these folks realize there might be numerous people waiting to get seated.
